title: President congratulates Pakistani mountaineer
content:
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “Well done,@Shehrozekashif2. You have made us proud once again, MashaAllah. This time Kanchenjunga 8586m in Nepal. As per his official Instagram account @thebroadboy he is now world’s youngest mountaineer who has scaled world’s three highest peaks (Everest, K2, Kanchenjunga).”
